Package opennlp.maxent.quasinewton

Interface Summary
DifferentiableFunction interface for a function that can be differentiated once.
Function interface for a function.
 

Class Summary
ArrayMath utility class for simple vector arithmetics.
LineSearch class that performs line search.
LineSearchResult class to store lineSearch result
LogLikelihoodFunction Evaluate log likelihood and its gradient from DataIndexer.
QNModel  
QNTrainer maxent model trainer using l-bfgs algorithm.
